mapper.sql: sm.ID AS id, sm.PARENT_ID AS parentId, sm.MENU_NAME AS menuName, sm.MENU_URL AS menuUrl, sm.PERMISSION_ID AS permissionId, sm.MENU_TYPE AS menuType, sm.MENU_ICON AS menuIcon, sm.SORT AS sort, sm.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, sm.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, sm.CREATE_ID AS createId, sm.UPDATE_ID AS updateId, sm.STATUS AS status
mapper.select: select count(*) from SYS_MENU sm where 1=1

select
from SYS_MENU sm where 1=1
limit 0,1

select
,sp.PERMISSION_NAME AS permissionName from SYS_MENU sm left join SYS_PERMISSION sp on sp.ID = sm.PERMISSION_ID where sm.PARENT_ID = #{parentId}

select
from SYS_MENU sm left join SYS_PERMISSION sp on sp.ID = sm.PERMISSION_ID left join SYS_ROLE_PERMISSION srp on srp.PERMISSION_ID = sp.ID where srp.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} AND sm.MENU_TYPE = '0' ORDER BY SORT ASC
